helpful: 14 of 37 people (38%) found this review helpful
review: Don't know why all the hate, I'm having no issues and am enjoying it so far.Edit: Still enjoying the game so much, runs really well and am having no problems.

How can you dislike this game? Awesome campaigns, great characters, endless amounts of fun. Various gamemodes spice it up a little bit, and if you get bored of the original campaigns, fear not, download a custom map and you're off for plenty more fun.
